name: Over the Hedge
description:
When a housing development intrudes on their woodland habitat and an
opossum is kidnapped by an evil exterminator, three wise-cracking
rodents and one very neurotic reptile invade the ’burbs in a quest to
rescue their friend.

Battle the exterminator and his army of mind-controlled mammals, and
save the forest (and your own hide) from the world’s peskiest
critter—man.

Features

• Play as RJ, Verne or Hammy each with their own cool moves.
•
Experience a whole new story and characters using touch-screen-only on DS
•
Master special 3D game play on both screens!!
